title: my account is hacked....
body:
hello my name is victor,
i play league of legends for a long time and spend a lot of money on it.
but nowmy account is hacked. the hacker has changed the password and email. so maybe you could help me with this situation. i hope so because this is very important for me.

i hope to see a email back from you thanks.

replies.body: Make sure you fill out a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and send it over to our accounts team by picking the option "I need help recovering my account!". After you verify yourself by answering some questions about the account, they'll be able to help you secure it and repair any damage.
